snippet: The merger of American Airlines and US Airways is a step closer to reality after the bankruptcy filing, which requires court and creditor approval.
abstract: AMR, parent company of American Airlines, files its formal plans to exit bankruptcy, bringing its proposed $11 billion merger with US Airways Group closer to reality.
lead_paragraph: The merger of American Airlines and US Airways is a step closer to reality after the bankruptcy filing, which requires court and creditor approval.

headline.main: AMR Submits Formal Plan to Exit Bankruptcy
headline.print_headline: AMR Submits Formal Plan to Exit Bankruptcy
